Veg Pizzas.name: The 4 Cheese Pizza
Veg Pizzas.description: Cheese Overloaded pizza with 4 different varieties of cheese and 4 times the cheese of a normal pizza, including a spicy hit of Ghost

Veg Pizzas.name: Margherita
Veg Pizzas.description: A hugely popular margherita, with a deliciously tangy single cheese topping

Veg Pizzas.name: Double Cheese Margherita
Veg Pizzas.description: The ever-popular Margherita - loaded with extra cheese... oodies of it!

Veg Pizzas.name: Farm House
Veg Pizzas.description: A pizza that goes ballistic on veggies! Check out this mouth watering overload of crunchy, crisp capsicum, succulent mushrooms and fresh tomatoes

Veg Pizzas.name: Peppy Paneer
Veg Pizzas.description: Chunky paneer with crisp capsicum and spicy red pepper - quite a mouthful!

Veg Pizzas.name: Mexican Green Wave
Veg Pizzas.description: A pizza loaded with crunchy onions, crisp capsicum, juicy tomatoes and jalapeno with a liberal sprinkling of exotic Mexican herbs.

Veg Pizzas.name: Deluxe Veggie
Veg Pizzas.description: For a vegetarian looking for a BIG treat that goes easy on the spices, this one's got it all.. The onions, the capsicum, those delectable mushrooms - with paneer and golden corn to top it all.

Veg Pizzas.name: Veg Extravaganza
Veg Pizzas.description: A pizza that decidedly staggers under an overload of golden corn, exotic black olives, crunchy onions, crisp capsicum, succulent mushrooms, juicy fresh tomatoes and jalapeno - with extra cheese to go all around.

Veg Pizzas.name: CHEESE N CORN
Veg Pizzas.description: Cheese I Golden Corn | Cheese n Corn Pizza

Veg Pizzas.name: PANEER MAKHANI
Veg Pizzas.description: Paneer and Capsicum on Makhani Sauce

Veg Pizzas.name: Indi Tandoori Paneer
Veg Pizzas.description: It is hot. It is spicy. It is oh-so-Indian. Tandoori paneer with capsicum I red paprika I mint mayo

Veg Pizzas.name: Moroccan Spice Pasta Pizza - Veg
Veg Pizzas.description: A pizza loaded with a spicy combination of Harissa sauce and delicious pasta.

Veg Pizzas.name: Achari Do Pyaza
Veg Pizzas.description: Tangy & spicy achari flavours on a super cheesy onion pizza- as desi as it gets!

Non-Veg Pizzas.name: Chicken Golden Delight
Non-Veg Pizzas.description: Mmm! Barbeque chicken with a topping of golden corn loaded with extra cheese. Worth its weight in gold!

Non-Veg Pizzas.name: Non Veg Supreme
Non-Veg Pizzas.description: Supreme combination of black olives, onions, grilled mushrooms, pepper BBQ chicken, peri-peri chicken, grilled chicken rashers

Non-Veg Pizzas.name: Chicken Dominator
Non-Veg Pizzas.description: Loaded with double pepper barbecue chicken, peri-peri chicken, chicken tikka & grilled chicken rashers

Non-Veg Pizzas.name: Indi Chicken Tikka
Non-Veg Pizzas.description: The wholesome flavour of tandoori masala with Chicken tikka I onion I red paprika I mint mayo

Non-Veg Pizzas.name: Creamy Tomato Pasta Pizza - Non Veg
Non-Veg Pizzas.description: Loaded with a delicious creamy tomato pasta topping , green capsicum, crunchy red and yellow bell peppers and black olives

Non-Veg Pizzas.name: Keema Do Pyaza
Non-Veg Pizzas.description: Delicious minced chicken keema topped with crunchy onions on your favourite cheesy pizza

Non-Veg Pizzas.name: Moroccan Spice Pasta Pizza - Non Veg
Non-Veg Pizzas.description: A pizza loaded with a spicy combination of Harissa sauce, Peri Peri chicken chunks and delicious pasta.

Pizza Mania.name: CHEESE N TOMATO
Pizza Mania.description: A delectable combination of cheese and juicy tomato

Pizza Mania.name: TOMATO
Pizza Mania.description: Juicy tomato in a flavourful combination with cheese I tangy sauce

Side Orders.name: Garlic Breadsticks
Side Orders.description: Freshly baked breadsticks with garlic butter and herbs

Side Orders.name: Stuffed Garlic Bread
Side Orders.description: Freshly baked garlic bread with cheese, onion and herbs

Side Orders.name: Paneer Tikka Stuffed Garlic Bread
Side Orders.description: Freshly baked garlic bread with cheese, onion, paneer tikka and herbs

Side Orders.name: Chicken Pepperoni Stuffed Garlic Bread
Side Orders.description: Freshly Baked Garlic Bread stuffed with Delectable Chicken Pepperoni, Cheese and sprinkled with Basil Parsley

Side Orders.name: Cheese Jalapeno Dip
Side Orders.description: A soft creamy cheese dip spiced with jalapeno.

Side Orders.name: Cheese Dip
Side Orders.description: A dreamy creamy cheese dip to add that extra tang to your snack.

Side Orders.name: Red Velvet Lava Cake
Side Orders.description: A truly indulgent experience with sweet and rich red velvet cake on a creamy cheese flavoured base to give a burst of flavour in

Side Orders.name: Lava Cake
Side Orders.description: Chocolate cake with a gooey molten chocolate center

Side Orders.name: Crunchy Strips
Side Orders.description: Oven baked wheat thin crips with peri peri seasoning with a cheesy dip

Side Orders.name: Potato Cheese Shots

Side Orders.name: Taco Mexicana-Veg(Single)
Side Orders.description: Truly irresistible! Crispy taco with a decicious veg patty & creamy sauce

Pasta.name: Moroccan Spice Pasta Veg
Pasta.description: Instant Fusilli Pasta, Harissa Sauce, Onion, Mushroom, Olives, Parsley sprinkle

Pasta.name: Creamy Tomato Pasta Non Veg
Pasta.description: Instant Fusilli Pasta, Creamy Culinary Dressing, Onion, Olives, BBQ Pepper Chicken, Parsley sprinkle

Pasta.name: Tikka Masala Pasta Non Veg
Pasta.description: Instant Fusilli Pasta, Spicy Red dressing, Onion, Chicken Tikka, Parsley sprinkle

Burger Pizza.name: BURGER PIZZA- CLASSIC VEG
Burger Pizza.description: Bite into delight! Witness the epic combination of pizza and burger with our classic Burger Pizza, that looks good and tastes great!

Burger Pizza.name: BURGER PIZZA- PREMIUM VEG
Burger Pizza.description: The good just got better! Treat yourself to the premium taste of the Burger Pizza, that looks good and tastes great with paneer and red paprika.

Burger Pizza.name: BURGER PIZZA- CLASSIC NON VEG
Burger Pizza.description: For all the meat cravers, try the classic non-veg Burger Pizza loaded with the goodness of burger and the greatness of pizza.

Chicken Wings.name: ROASTED CHICKEN WINGS CLASSIC HOT SAUCE

Choice of Crusts.name: Cheese Burst
Choice of Crusts.description: Crust with oodles of yummy liquid Dairy cheese sauce filled inside.

Choice of Crusts.name: Classic Hand Tossed
Choice of Crusts.description: Dominos traditional hand stretched crust, crisp on outside, soft & light inside.

Choice of Crusts.name: Wheat Thin Crust
Choice of Crusts.description: Presenting the light healthier and delicious light wheat thin crust from Dominos.

Choice of Toppings.name: veg toppings
Choice of Toppings.description: Black Olives, Crisp Capsicum, Paneer, Mushroom, Golden Corn, Fresh Tomato, Jalapeno, Red Pepper & Babycorn.
